Article.ArticleTitle: Long COVID: long-term health outcomes and implications for policy and research.

Abstract.AbstractText: Long COVID, which refers to post-acute and chronic sequelae of SARS-CoV-2 infection, can affect nearly every organ system and all demographic groups. The high and growing toll of long COVID calls for an urgent need to understand how to prevent and treat it. Governments and health systems must address the care needs of people with long COVID.
